This short game is part of the BlackThornProd 2021 Gamejam and is about a squid king that is bored and lonely and is looking for the ocean surface.

Will you help them to find sun?

Please note that the screenshot taken with the yellyfish isn't as peaceful as it would make you believe, they want to eat you and you need to get out.

The way it ties into the theme ''Less is more.''

-1 game mechanic : If you move slowly, more jellyfish will spawn. If balanced correctly, this could let the player choose their preferred style.

-1 story mechanic: For the lonely squid, feeling the sun is something really small, but it means a lot to them.

Hopefully coming:

-Music

-Sounds

-Balancing?

-About page explaining some things

It's a fun and short game and I am happy that this was the first game I can really call my own. 

Great thanks to the BlackThornProd community, this week has been an absolute blast and learned me so much.
